data.event: Founded in 1879, it became the county seat of Morton County in 1881.

event.title: became the county seat of Morton County in 1881

data.event: Founded in 1879, it became the county seat of Morton County in 1881.

event.title: measured the population at 18,331 in the 2010

data.event: The U.S. Census Bureau measured the population at 18,331 in the 2010 census and estimated the 2014 population at 20,820.
The U.S. Census Bureau measured the population at 18,331 in the 2010 census and estimated the 2014 population at 20,820.
In 2013, Mandan was selected a finalist in Rand McNally Most Patriotic City competition.
A Tesoro refinery north of Mandan began operations in 1954 and today has a capacity of 71,000 barrels per day (bpd).
